publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2334 Karen Whitefield: Airdrieonians Football Club-That the Parliament congratulates Ian McCall and all the players, staff and supporters of Airdrieonians Football Club on their recent success in winning the 2001 Challenge Cup Final and wishes them success in their efforts to ensure that Airdrie continues to benefit from having a locally based community football team.

S1M-2334 Airdrieonians Football Club (lodged on 19 October 2001) Mr Michael McMahon*, Kate MacLean*, Mr Murray Tosh*, Andrew Wilson*, Patricia Ferguson*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Phil Gallie*, Brian Adam*, Cathy Jamieson*, Nora Radcliffe*, Brian Fitzpatrick*, Elaine Smith*, Johann Lamont*, Cathie Craigie*, Mr Frank McAveety*
S1M-2334 Airdrieonians Football Club (lodged on 19 October 2001) Karen Gillon*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Mrs Mary Mulligan*, Trish Godman*
S1M-2334 Airdrieonians Football Club (lodged on 19 October 2001) Janis Hughes*, Tommy Sheridan*, Mike Watson*, Scott Barrie*

S1M-2334 Airdrieonians Football Club (lodged on 19 October 2001) Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-2334 Airdrieonians Football Club (lodged on 19 October 2001) Dr Winnie Ewing*, Linda Fabiani*
S1M-2334 Airdrieonians Football Club (lodged on 19 October 2001) Pauline McNeill*
